meta.author: Remco van der Velde (remco@universeorange.com)
meta.title: CMS | Funda.world
install.title: Funda CMS
install.text:
Welcome to the installation...
Before you can use Funda CMS we need some information.
install.credentials.title: Credentials
install.credentials.text: These credentials are used for the main administrator and can be changed later in the user section.
install.email.label: E-mail
install.password.label: Password
install.password.again.label: Password again
install.domain.title: Domain
install.domain.text:
Please specify the main domain name and its extension without subdomain.
Subdomains and other domains can be configured later and Funda CMS is using cms as its subdomain for your main domain.
Example: www.example.com, use example.com and cms.example.com is where the cms lives.
install.domain.label: Host:
